extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.String query)
      delete Deleting a row from the DB here for legacy reasons, otherwise use mod() for modifications to DB
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fetchColumn(java.lang.String query)
      fetchColumn fetches a column from the DB, if the query returns several columns, the first one is selected.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fetchRow(java.lang.String query)
      fetchRow fetches 1 row from the DB, if the query has several rows the first one is selected.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> fetchRows(java.lang.String query)
      fetchRows fetches 1 to N number of rows from the DB into an ArrayList of HashMaps where the ArrayList index is the row and the HashMap contains the rows values with the columns "name" as its key.
      java.lang.String fetchSingle(java.lang.String query)
      fetchSingle fetches a single value from the DB, if the query returns several values, the first one is selected.
      java.lang.String getAutoIncrement(java.lang.String table, java.lang.String attribut)
      getAutoIncrement Retrieves and counts a number upwards for a column that contains Integers, to simulate an incrementing number.
      void insert(java.lang.String query)
      insert Inserting a row into the DB here for legacy reasons, otherwise use mod() for modifications to DB
      void mod(java.lang.String query)
      mod Modifies the DB with any SQL DDL or SQL DML INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE
      void update(java.lang.String query)
      update Updating a row or value in the DB here for legacy reasons, otherwise use mod() for modifications to DB

      • InfDB

        public InfDB(java.lang.String path)

        InfDB Constructor for the DB class
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the Firebird DB, for example C:/DB.FDB or for Mac /User/DB.FDB
        Throws:
        InfException

    • Method Detail

      • fetchSingle

        public java.lang.String fetchSingle(java.lang.String query)
                             throws InfException
        fetchSingle fetches a single value from the DB, if the query returns several values, the first one is selected.
        Parameters:
        query - SQL query for the DB
        Returns:
        a String containing the value.
        Throws:
        InfException - If the query doesn't work an error is thrown.

      • fetchColumn

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fetchColumn(java.lang.String query)
                                                  throws InfException
        fetchColumn fetches a column from the DB, if the query returns several columns, the first one is selected.
        Parameters:
        query - SQL query for the DB
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing the columns row values.
        Throws:
        InfException - If the query doesn't work an error is thrown.

      • fetchRow

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fetchRow(java.lang.String query)
                                                              throws InfException
        fetchRow fetches 1 row from the DB, if the query has several rows the first one is selected.
        Parameters:
        query - SQL query for the DB
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing the rows values with the columns "name" as their key.
        Throws:
        InfException - If the query doesn't work an error is thrown.

      • fetchRows

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> fetchRows(java.lang.String query)
                                                                                    throws InfException
        fetchRows fetches 1 to N number of rows from the DB into an ArrayList of HashMaps where the ArrayList index is the row and the HashMap contains the rows values with the columns "name" as its key.
        Parameters:
        query - SQL query for the DB
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of HashMaps where the ArrayList is the rows number and the HashMap the rows values with the columns "name" as their key.
        Throws:
        InfException - If the query doesn't work an error is thrown.

      • getAutoIncrement

        public java.lang.String getAutoIncrement(java.lang.String table,
                                         java.lang.String attribut)
                                  throws InfException
        getAutoIncrement Retrieves and counts a number upwards for a column that contains Integers, to simulate an incrementing number.
        Parameters:
        table - The table where the number(ID) is located
        attribut - The column name in the table of the number(ID)
        Returns:
        returns the number(ID) +1
        Throws:
        InfException - If the query didn't work or a column contains something else than numbers an error is thrown.

      • mod

        public void mod(java.lang.String query)
         throws InfException
        mod Modifies the DB with any SQL DDL or SQL DML INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE
        Parameters:
        query - SQL query for the DB
        Throws:
        InfException - If the DB reported an error with the query an error is thrown containing a message why the error occurred

      • insert

        public void insert(java.lang.String query)
            throws InfException
        insert Inserting a row into the DB here for legacy reasons, otherwise use mod() for modifications to DB
        Parameters:
        query - SQL query for the DB
        Throws:
        InfException - If insert isn't correctly formatted throws an error
